title: Large Donation | Free Geek
content:
Do you have a donation of over 20 devices and are interested in finding a good time to drop off your technology? Please email dropoffs@freegeek.org to schedule a time.

Need help transporting your donation?  While you’re welcome to bring items directly to our facility for donation, Free Geek provides a paid pickup service for donations over 20 devices throughout the Portland metro area. Our friendly staff will pick up your technology with minimal disruption to your day. By scheduling your electronics recycling pickup with Free Geek, you'll know that your technology is being recycled according to the highest ethical standards or reused in one of our valuable community programs. Please fill out the form below.

**If you have less than 20 devices to donate to Free Geek, please see our Small Donation page.
If you are looking to donate corporate technology, please see our Corporate Donation page.

Is my data secure?
What technology do you accept?
How much does pickup cost?
When do pickups occur?
html:
Do you have a donation of over 20 devices and are interested in finding a good time to drop off your technology? Please email dropoffs@freegeek.org to schedule a time.

Need help transporting your donation?  While you’re welcome to bring items directly to our facility for donation, Free Geek provides a paid pickup service for donations over 20 devices throughout the Portland metro area. Our friendly staff will pick up your technology with minimal disruption to your day. By scheduling your electronics recycling pickup with Free Geek, you'll know that your technology is being recycled according to the highest ethical standards or reused in one of our valuable community programs. Please fill out the form below.

**If you have less than 20 devices to donate to Free Geek, please see our Small Donation page.
If you are looking to donate corporate technology, please see our Corporate Donation page.

Is my data secure?

We’re committed to ensuring the data security of all the devices we receive.

Learn more about our secure data practices.

What technology do you accept?

Free Geek accepts nearly everything that plugs into a computer or uses electricity, with some exceptions.

How much does pickup cost?

We keep it simple with a flat fee of $150 for all pick-ups of accepted items. Please have a check ready at pickup.

We can also process payments via credit card or invoice you. If you opt to receive an invoice, please let us know who to contact for accounts payable so we can get the invoice to them directly.

When do pickups occur?

Pickups are generally scheduled for Tuesday and Thursday mornings between 10am-1pm.
